channel.title: TGRoss
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGRoss, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The #1 Indicator a Sector is About to Surge?
item.description: Hey, Ross Givens here! The S&P 500 and Nasdaq are setting up a textbook breakout pattern—one of my favorite setups for explosive short-term gains. Mar...
